scripts.build: esbuild --bundle src/edge_worker.ts --platform=node --format=esm --external:create-response --external:http-request --external:html-rewriter --external:streams --external:log --outdir=dist && mv dist/edge_worker.js dist/main.js && cp src/bundle.json dist/
scripts.pack: cd dist && tar -czvf akamai.tgz bundle.json main.js
scripts.devclean: rm -rf node_nodules && rm -rf dist && rm package-lock.json
